full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BDUD RTZI SNYING PO YAN LAG BRGYAD PA GSANG BA MAN NGAG GI RGYUD LAS DUM BU DANG PO RTZA BA'I RGYUD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,BDUD RTZI SNYING PO YAN LAG BRGYAD PA GSANG BA MAN NGAG GI RGYUD LAS RTZA BA'I RGYUD CES BYA BA RDZOGS SO, ,SHLO KA GNYIS PO 'DI GRA THANG SOR BZHAG DUS 'GING NAS PAR BYANG LA GNANG BA, SPRUL ZHING LHA NA SDUG PA'I GRONG KHYER NAS, ,RIG PA'I YE SHES GZUGS GZHAN YONGS BSGYUR BA'I, SROG 'TSO'I MCHOD SBYIN 'GYED MKHAS BYANG DOS PA, GSO RIG DAR RGYAS BYED POS BSKUL BA LAS, YAN LAG BRGYAD DANG LDAN PA'I BDUD RTZI'I BCUD, 'KHRUL MED GLEGS BAM ZA MA TOG 'KHYIL BA, SLAR YANG YID BZHIN 'DOD PA 'JO BA'I PAR, SDE BZHI'I DPAL LDAN @021B PO TA LA NAS SPEL, AA HO RGYAL BKA' RGYUD CHEN YID BZHIN NOR, ,BYANG ZUR MKHAS PAS BYI DOR LEGS MDZAD KYANG, ,SLAR YANG SPAS BCAD DRI YIS SPAGS PO KUN, ,SA RA'I SHES BRTZON LUNG RIGS DPYAD GSUM GYIS, ,LEGS PAR BKRUS PA'I BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL, ,'GRO KUN BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN RTZER BKOD PAS, ,MI DGE ZUG RNGU'I DBUL BA DRUNGS PHYUNG NAS, ,TSE NOR BDE BA'I DNGOS GRUB CHAR DU BSNYIL, ,SRID ZHI'I 'DREN PA PHYAG NA PAD DKAR 'CHANG, , BYAMS MGON SPRUL @022A *, ,SKUR BYON PAR RTAG BRTAN CING, ,DGA' LDAN PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL PHO BRANG CHE'I, ,CHOS SRID DKAR CHA'I ZLA BZHIN GONG 'PHEL SHOG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,DGE'O, SHU BHAm, ,)
